Detailed Description

Encapsulates animatin data as a sequence of time-stamped, vector-valued keyframes.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  num_components,
int  interpolation

Constructs a new2 keyframe sequence with specified interpolation method, number of components per keyframe, and number of keyframes.

Member Data Documentation

const int CONSTANT = 192 [static]

A parameter to setRepeatMode, specifying that this sequence is to be played back just once and not repeated.

const int LINEAR = 176 [static]

A constructor parameter that specifies linear interpolation between keyframes.

const int LOOP = 193 [static]

A parameter to setRepeatMode, specifying that this sequence is to be repeated indefinitely.

const int SLERP = 177 [static]

A constructor parameter that specifies sphereical linear interpolation of quaternions.

const int SPLINE = 178 [static]

A constructor parameter that specifies spline interpolation between keyframes.

const int SQUAD = 179 [static]

A constructor parametr that specifies spline inteterpolation of quaternions.

const int STEP = 180 [static]

A constructor parameter that specifies stepping from one keyframe value to the next.
